sections.name: VVIP Lounge/Round Table (per person)
sections.info:
- ⁠Unlimited food & beverages for 180 minutes (7pm - 10 pm)
⁠- Access to all areas
- Exclusive round table service
⁠- Unlimited IMFL pouring
- ⁠Clear and unobstructed view of the stage
